thread.title: Brigid

author: Brigid
title: Brigid
text: I started selling my books via sellbackyourbook.com a year ago. I check prices on Bookscouter, and I sell to several different services, but I use sellbackyourbook.com the most because their prices are usually the best. I send off the books, with their prepaid label, and they put the money in my PayPal account. It takes a little time, because the books go by media mail, but I get an e-mail from them to let me know the books have arrived and another when they have been checked. Once they made a mistake and said I omitted a book, but when I e-mailed them they quickly corrected it. Other than that I have had no issues, but I was impressed that they got back to me immediately that first time. The good prices and smoothness of transaction make this my first choice when I'm clearing off my shelves.
